about.label: Discover Kenaz
about.title: Why Kenaz?
about.subtitle: A place where movement, connection, and growth share one rhythm. Join when it fits — stay because it feels right.
about.ctaMessage: Join now and see what Kenaz feels like from the inside.
about.socialSubtitle: See the people and the atmosphere before you join.
about.shopBody: Simple, comfortable pieces made for shared moments. If you want a bit of Kenaz in everyday life — check the shop.
about.mediaBody: A radio interview presents Kenaz as an offline community: shared running, cold plunges, trips, and bonfires without the internet. It’s for people who want more than just home and work.
about.sponsorsBody: We work with brands that support active, healthy lifestyles and community growth.

attendees.label: people who have joined our events

stories.title: Events that create rhythm
stories.body: Kenaz is a steady cadence of meetups that gives your week energy. You don’t need experience or peak form — just a willingness to show up and do something good for yourself.

stories.title: Movement that brings balance
stories.body: We mix activities that strengthen body and mind. Training here isn’t a race — it’s calm, consistent progress. We meet offline because real bonds happen in real moments.

stories.title: A community with values
stories.body: Kenaz is more than an event list. It’s people who care about growth, health, and good relationships. Smaller groups make it easy to connect and feel at home.

stories.title: Motivation for real change
stories.body: Shared energy is the best accelerator. It’s easier to keep healthy habits when the people around you choose movement, calm, and honest connection.

stories.title: Trips that stay with you
stories.body: From time to time we go bigger — a trip, a focused weekend, a shared adventure. These moments bond the group and create stories for years.

stories.title: The power of shared energy
stories.body: What makes Kenaz special is how real it feels. Support, conversation, laughter, effort — that’s the atmosphere you want to return to.

events.title: Events
events.subtitle: Regular gatherings that set the rhythm and energy of our community.
highlights: Kenaz is a rhythm that helps you break routine and do something for yourself — without pressure, in good company.
Our trainings and activities aren’t for show. It’s steady, grounded work on energy and wellbeing.
We meet offline because real relationships are built in real moments — talk, laughter, shared effort.
Each event has a vibe: sometimes sporty, sometimes social, sometimes purely restorative.
We keep groups small, so it’s easy to meet people and feel like you belong.
Join when it fits you — pick the activities that match your pace.
If you want growth that feels natural and a supportive atmosphere, Kenaz is for you.

community.title: Community
community.subtitle: Relationships that last — a circle of people with shared values.
highlights: Offline meetups without pressure or pretense
A strong sense of belonging and support
New connections that grow into friendships

trips.title: Trips
trips.subtitle: Immersive, curated trips that stay with you for years.
highlights: Saunas, mountain lodges, and themed expeditions

fields.title: Title

fields.rescueCutoffHoursTooltip: How many hours before the event a participant can use a rescue instead of a standard cancellation.
fields.rescueMonthlyLimitTooltip: How many times per month a participant can use the rescue option.
